TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定義可讓類別載入自訂組態的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that enable a class to load custom configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可實作介面可以從 XML 載入自訂組態。Classes that implement the interface can load custom configuration from XML. 數個 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 類別實作介面，以提供讓您定義的自訂設定的功能在衍生類別，從組態檔。Several of the Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) classes implement the interface to provide the capability for you to define custom configuration of derived classes from a configuration file. 許多 WIF 類別提供這個方法以提供它們所表示之物件的預設組態的基底實作。Many of the WIF classes provide a base implementation of this method to provide the default configuration for the objects they represent.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodeList) cil managed

param.name: nodeList
param.span: 包含自訂組態的 XML 節點。

span.span: The XML nodes that contain the custom configuration.

param.span: 清單中的每個節點的型別為 。

span.span: Each node in the list is of type .

summary.span: 從 XML 載入自訂組態。
覆寫這個方法，以提供組態項目的自訂處理。

span.span: Override this method to provide custom handling of configuration elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`參數會包含最上層的子系的項目設定從組態檔的物件類別的父項目。When this method is called, the `nodelist` parameter contains the top-level child elements of the parent element that configures the object class from the configuration file. 比方說的類別衍生自，會有子項目的[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目傳入`nodelist`參數。For example, a class derived from , will have the child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element passed in the `nodelist` parameter. `nodelist`是組成完全物件。The `nodelist` is composed entirely of objects. 其中每一項可能是屬性和子項目，視所要設定的類別定義組態結構描述。Each of these may have attributes and child elements depending on the configuration schema defined for the class that is being configured.
